metadata.title: USN-6199-2 -- PHP vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6199-1 fixed a vulnerability in PHP. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain Digest  authentication for SOAP. An attacker could possibly use this issue  to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6199-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php7.2-bz2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-enchant - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-ldap - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-fpm - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-recode - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-cli - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-json - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-bcmath - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-phpdbg - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-pspell - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-dev - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-sqlite3 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-gmp - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-opcache - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-gd - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-soap - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-intl - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-cgi - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-odbc - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-tidy - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-imap - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-readline - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-mysql - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-dba - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-xml - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-interbase - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-xsl - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-xmlrpc - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-pgsql - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-sybase - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-curl - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-common - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-mbstring - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-snmp - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 php7.2-zip - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.17+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
